meanings.definition: The process of printing on both sides of a sheet of paper.
meanings.sent1: I learned about duplexing in school when we printed our essays on both sides of the paper.
meanings.sent2: The printer at the office has a duplexing feature that saves paper by printing on both sides.
meanings.sent3: The printer was so good at duplexing that it could probably print a book on a single sheet!
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a duplexing printer, processing information on both sides simultaneously.
meanings.sent5: The art of duplexing made the document look professional and eco-friendly.

meanings.definition: The ability of a communication system to transmit and receive signals simultaneously.
meanings.sent1: The new phone model boasts advanced duplexing technology for crystal-clear calls.
meanings.sent2: Duplexing in telecommunications allows for seamless two-way communication.
meanings.sent3: The duplexing feature on the walkie-talkies made the kids feel like secret agents.
meanings.sent4: Their relationship was like a duplexing connection, always in sync and responsive.
meanings.sent5: The duplexing function ensured that both parties could talk and listen at the same time.

meanings.definition: A building containing two separate living units.
meanings.sent1: The duplexing next door is painted in a lovely shade of blue.
meanings.sent2: Living in a duplexing property provides the convenience of close neighbors.
meanings.sent3: The duplexing residents often shared a backyard barbecue for fun.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a duplexing house, connected yet with separate spaces.
meanings.sent5: The duplexing layout of the building allowed for privacy while still being close to family.
